participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

gish_m1_y.Description: How much do you feel like a boy? | 5 = Totally; 4 = Mostly; 3 = Somewhat; 2 = A little; 1 = Not at all; 0 = Decline to answer

gish_m2_y.Description: How much do you feel like a girl? | 1 = Totally; 2 = Mostly; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = A little; 5 = Not at all; 0 = Decline to answer

gish_f1_y.Description: How much do you feel like a girl? | 5 = Totally; 4 = Mostly; 3 = Somewhat; 2 = A little; 1 = Not at all; 0 = Decline to answer

gish_f2_y.Description: How much do you feel like a boy? | 1 = Totally; 2 = Mostly; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = A little; 5 = Not at all; 0 = Decline to answer

gish_m3_y.Description: How much have you had the wish to be a girl? | 1 = Always; 2 = Often; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Rarely; 5 = Never; 0 = Decline to answer

gish_m4_y.Description: How much have you dressed or acted as a girl during play? | 1 = Always; 2 = Often; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Rarely; 5 = Never; 0 = Decline to answer

gish_f3_y.Description: How much have you had the wish to be a boy? | 1 = Always; 2 = Often; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Rarely; 5 = Never; 0 = Decline to answer

gish_f4_y.Description: How much have you dressed or acted as a boy during play? | 1 = Always; 2 = Often; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Rarely; 5 = Never; 0 = Decline to answer

gish_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self-Administered ; 3=Combination [event_name_number] > '21'

y_gish2_desc_fem.Description: How do you think other people would describe you? | 1 = Very feminine; 2 = Mostly feminine; 3 = Somewhat feminine; 4 = Equally feminine and masculine; 5 = Somewhat masculine; 6 = Mostly masculine; 7 = Very masculine; 1 = Always; 2 = Often; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Rarely; 5 = Never; 0 = Decline to answer

y_gish2_desc_fem_self.Description: How would you describe yourself? | 1 = Very feminine; 2 = Mostly feminine; 3 = Somewhat feminine; 4 = Equally feminine and masculine; 5 = Somewhat masculine; 6 = Mostly masculine; 7 = Very masculine; 1 = Always; 2 = Often; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Rarely; 5 = Never; 0 = Decline to answer

y_gish2_desc_male.Description: How do you think others would describe you? | 1 = Very masculine; 2 = Mostly masculine; 3 = Somewhat masculine; 4 = Equally feminine and masculine; 5 = Somewhat feminine; 6 = Mostly feminine; 7 = Very feminine

y_gish2_desc_male_self.Description: How would you describe yourself? | 1 = Very masculine; 2 = Mostly masculine; 3 = Somewhat masculine; 4 = Equally feminine and masculine; 5 = Somewhat feminine; 6 = Mostly feminine; 7 = Very feminine

gish_y_ss_m_avg.Description: GISH Male Gender Averaged (gish_m1_y:gish_m4_y); Validation: No more than 1 item missing or decline

gish_y_ss_f_avg.Description: GISH Female Gender Averaged (gish_f1_y:gish_f4_y); Validation: No more than 1 item missing or decline

kbi_sex_assigned_at_birth.Description: What was your sex assigned at birth, on your birth certificate? | 1, Male | 2, Female | 999, Don't know | 777, Refuse to answer

kbi_gender.Description: What is your current gender identity? | 1, Boy | 2, Girl | 3, Another gender (e.g. nonbinary) | 999, I don't understand the question | 777, Refuse to answer

kbi_y_trans_id.Description: Are you transgender? | 1, Yes | 2, Maybe | 3, No | 4, I do not understand this question | 777, Refuse to answer

kbi_y_trans_prob.Description: Has this caused any problems for you with your family or with kids at school? | 1, Not at all | 2, Some | 3, A lot | 777, Refuse to answer
